# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer holds immense value, worth $1,000,000 to you. We are extending this exclusive chance to acquire it at a special price tailored to make this acquisition as beneficial as possible for you. Our proposed offer is $900,000. This price reflects our commitment to finding a mutually advantageous solution while ensuring a fair return for us. We believe this offer presents an exceptional opportunity for both parties and look forward to your positive consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
